ARABIC: بَشِّرِ ٱلْمُنَٰفِقِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Give news to the hypocrites that they will have a painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Give tidings to the hypocrites that painful is their doom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Give tidings of painful chastisement to the hypocrites.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Tell the hypocrites that for them there will be a painful torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Give glad tidings to the hypocrites, that for them is a painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Give to the hypocrites the tidings that there is for them a painful torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Announce to the hypocrites that they shall have a painful chastisement:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Give thou good tidings to the hypocrites that for them awaits a painful chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Bear unto the hypocrites the tidings that for them there is a painful doom;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Warn the hypocrites that for them there is a painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Announce thou to the hypocrites that theirs shall be a torment afflictive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Inform the hypocrites that there is a painful punishment for them
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: To the Hypocrites give the glad tidings that there is for them (but) a grievous penalty;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Give to the hypocrites the tidings that there is for them a painful torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Give glad tidings to the hypocrites that for them there is a painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Inform the hypocrites that they will have a painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Give tidings to the hypocrites that there is for them a painful punishment -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [4:138] Give tidings to, inform, O Muhammad (s), the hypocrites that for them there is a painful chastisement, namely, the chastisement of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then said about the hypocrites: (Bear unto the hypocrites) 'Abdullah Ibn Ubayy and his followers as well as all hypocrites till the Day of Judgement (the tidings that for them there is a painful doom) which will extend to their hearts;
